short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AAArdvark is an all-in-one testing, monitoring, issue management, and reporting platform for accessibility audits and remediation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AAArdvark is an accessibility platform built to help accessibility professionals complete comprehensive and thorough audits as fast as possible. With our one-of-a-kind Visual Mode feature, you can see live web pages and log issues in a fraction of the time it takes to do the same on a spreadsheet. With Team Management features an entire team can track, assign, and discuss issues in real-time, making messy email threads and unwieldy spreadsheets a thing of the past. And ongoing monitoring gives you peace of mind that your website stays accessible.

Use the AAArdvark Chrome Extension today to unlock the power of Visual Mode in AAArdvark. 
• Easy reporting of a11y issues found in manual tests and audits
• Interactive view of accessibility issues (Chrome Extension required)
• Unlimited users and access to collaboration tools for remediation
• Automatic confirmation of fixes to common a11y issues
• Automated scanning and monitoring of web pages
• Accessibility monitoring notifications and updates

Please note that an AAArdvark Workspace is required to use the Chrome Extension.
